CustomField.description: Salesforce Lightning Design System (SLDS) name of icon to display. Should follow <lightning:icon /> naming convention (ex: standard:user, action:freeze_user). Icons are located here: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Salesforce Lightning Design System (SLDS) name of icon to display. Should follow <lightning:icon /> naming convention (ex: standard:user, action:freeze_user). Icons are located here: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/
CustomField.label: Badge Icon Name
